about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of Emperor Apollo Tiberius, last of his name, in this fictional Cold War era text RPG. As emperor you must allocate the government budget, set ministerial policies, enact royal decrees, make deals with friends and foes alike, and respond to critical events that can change the course of history. Powerful factions grow within the Empire, and amidst these uncertain times, divine right is no longer enough to stay in power. You must gain allies at court, or risk sharing the fate of your father, and his father before him.

Peace in the Ostaldian Empire hangs by a thread. Border incursions by Yudova and Arconte continue inside disputed territories. Rival superpowers Renavian Republic and Krassnian Union grow more aggressive in their attempts to pull your Empire under their influence. The failed rapid industrialization effort under your predecessor leaves the Ostaldian economy in a recession. Wealth inequality is at an all time high, and unrest among the lower classes rises to heights not seen since the Great Civil War. The people demand change, but with so many different voices you cannot satisfy them all.

Despite the mountain of problems you must face, the Empire has a long and proud history of resilience, and the people have placed their trust in you to lead them back from the brink. But the goodwill of your citizens will not last forever as conspiracies brew in the shadows, waiting for you to show weakness. The Tiberius Dynasty has ruled the Empire for the past 300 years, and the royal line may end with you. How far will you go to make the Empire great again?

FEATURES


  • Interact with the 6 Ministries: Finance, Economy, Foreign Affairs, Social Affairs, War, and Interior. Choose from over 60 policies while carefully managing your budget.

  • Choose from over 30 Royal Decrees to enact, further refining your rule.

  • Immerse yourself in the world through over 100 events, and choose how you want to lead.

  • Engage in diplomacy with powerful internal factions and other nations on your own terms.

  • Align with the Renavian Republic, Krassnian Union, declare neutrality, or forge a path of your own to survive the Cold War.

  • Delegate tasks wisely, as you cannot be everywhere at once.

  • Play through 8 years of a living world, and guide your people through the Cold War over the course of 32 seasonal turns.

  • Experience 7 different endings, each with a profound impact on the future of your people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 900 series, AMD Radeon RX 400 series or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 12 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 10 series, AMD Radeon RX 500 series or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 12 compatible

short_description: Lead a waning Empire back to its former glory in this fictional Cold War text-based RPG. As emperor, choose who to trust and who to silence. Adapt to changing times or cling to tradition. Enact reforms to revive the economy, enforce law and order, and reinforce the Empire’s place under the Sun.
